title: Bartaševičs in no rush to step down from Rēzekne's mayoral post
summary_full: Rēzekne's mayor Aleksandrs Bartaševičs (Together for Latvia), who has not been granted access to state secrets as required by law, continued to perform his duties at the council meeting on Thursday, February 5, LSM Latgale studio reports.
